governanceRules.title: Documentation Auto-Generation Governance Framework
governanceRules.corePrinciple: JSON is Authority, Markdown is Reflection
governanceRules.description: All documentation must be auto-generated from JSON source-of-truth to prevent documentation/architecture drift

ruleSet.title: Single Source of Truth (SSoT)
ruleSet.requirement: Every system has exactly ONE authoritative JSON file as source-of-truth
ruleSet.reflection: All documentation generated FROM that JSON
ruleSet.enforcement: CI/CD blocks commits with manually-edited generated docs

ruleSet.title: Auto-Generation Pipeline
ruleSet.requirement: Every JSON authority file MUST have a corresponding generation script
ruleSet.pipeline: All generation scripts run in pre:manifests pipeline before build
ruleSet.order: Registry generation (creates JSON) → Documentation generation (reads JSON)
ruleSet.enforcement: Automatically enforced on every npm run build

ruleSet.title: Generated Document Marking
ruleSet.header: All auto-generated markdown files MUST have <!-- AUTO-GENERATED -->
ruleSet.footer: All auto-generated files MUST have <!-- DO NOT EDIT - Regenerate with: npm run build -->
ruleSet.audit: Scripts scan for manually-edited marked files and fail build

ruleSet.title: No Manual Documentation
ruleSet.prohibition: Developers MUST NOT hand-write documentation marked as auto-generated
ruleSet.alternative: Update the JSON source → script regenerates the markdown
ruleSet.enforcement: Pre-commit hook blocks commits that edit auto-generated files

enforcementMechanisms.action: Blocks commits if ANY auto-generated file modified

enforcementMechanisms.purpose: Fail build if governance violations detected
checks: All auto-generated files marked with <!-- AUTO-GENERATED -->
All JSON authorities have generation scripts

enforcementMechanisms.outputs: Document governance manifest with compliance summary

patternRecognition.title: Pattern Recognition Achievement
patternRecognition.coreDiscovery: JSON is Authority, Markdown is Reflection

whatWasDiscovered.foundationalPattern: Architectural pattern that governs entire orchestration audit system
whatWasDiscovered.description: Not just a coding convention—it's a governance model that prevents documentation/architecture drift
guarantees: Single Source of Truth: One JSON file per system
Deterministic Generation: Same JSON → Same markdown (every time)
No Manual Editing: Developers cannot hand-edit auto-generated docs
Automatic Sync: Every build regenerates all documentation
Drift Prevention: Impossible to have stale documentation

preExistingImplementations: Sprint reports → Auto-generated from project plan
